overview: Alien Holidays tells the grand adventure of Xiam on our beloved but not easy planet Earth. Very different from his planet, hyper-technological but with no form of lifeblood, the Earth looks like a dream for Xiam! And here he will find a passion for nature , friendship, but not with his fellow men, but with Sheriff Arturo But ambitions and friendship are not the only things Xiam will find, but the love for a sweet Ninetta with whom he will face and challenge an evil and ingenious Ted Must.
title: Alien Holidays
